  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92599</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92599</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Brûler des déchets</string>
            <string language="en">Burning waste materials</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brennende Abfälle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Materiais waste ardentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Materiali riciclati burning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καίγοντας απόβλητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Materiales de desecho ardientes</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que brûler les déchets ne les font pas disparaître. Les atomes de carbone des  déchets se combine à l'oxygène dans le ciel pour former le dioxyde de carbone.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that burning waste materials do not make them go away.  Carbon atoms from the waste material combine with oxygen in the air to form carbon dioxide.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">brûlant</string>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">dioxyde de carbone</string>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pollution</string>
            <string language="en">Pollution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">perte</string>
            <string language="en">waste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">disposition des déchets</string>
            <string language="en">waste disposal</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß brennende Abfälle 
sie nicht weggehen lassen. Kohlenstoffatome vom Abfall 
kombinieren mit Sauerstoff in der Luft, um Kohlendioxyd zu bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os materiais waste 
ardentes não os fazem partir. Os átomos de carbono do material
waste combinam com o oxigênio no ar para dar forma ao dióxido de 
carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i materiali 
riciclati burning non li fanno andare via. Gli atomi di carbonio
dal materiale riciclato uniscono con ossigeno nell'aria per formare 
l'anidride carbonica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα καίγοντας απόβλητα 
δεν τους κάνουν να πάνε μακριά. Τα άτομα άνθρακα από τα 
απόβλητα συνδυάζουν με το οξυγόνο στον αέρα να διαμορφώσουν το 
διοξείδιο του άνθρακα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los materiales de 
desecho ardientes no hacen que salen. Los átomos de carbón del
material de desecho combinan con oxígeno en el aire para formar el 
bióxido de carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brennen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verunreinigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergeudung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abfallbeseitigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">queimadura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Poluição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">desperdício</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">eliminação waste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bruciarsi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anidride carbonica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inquinamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spreco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">eliminazione rifiuta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κάψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διοξείδιο του άνθρακα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρύπανση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απόβλητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διάθεση αποβλήτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el quemarse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Contaminación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">basura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">disposición inútil</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
